Package documentation

connectapi-package

connectapi: Utilities for Interacting with the RStudio Connect Server API

Functions to audit vanity URLs, R versions, etc.

Audit Access Controls

Audit R Versions

Functions to work with deployments

Define a bundle from a path (a tar.gz file)

Get Content Item

Get Content Title

Users and groups
